definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
to work hectically/to be on the go/to run around attending to various tasks

sentences.english: The next door neighbour enjoys repairing his fence with his HiFi.
sentences.chinese: 鄰居樂顛顛地開着音響修籬笆。

sentences.english: LL: Wacky means crazy or silly.
sentences.chinese: Wacky就是指瘋瘋顛顛或犯傻。

sentences.english: Love is making you go bananas.
sentences.chinese: 戀愛使你變得瘋瘋顛顛的。
